alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bradford, east central Alachua, northwestern Putnam and southern Clay Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Geneva, or near Melrose, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Keystone Heights, Melrose Landing, George`s Lake, Kingsley, Lake Geneva, Florahome, Camp Blanding and Putnam Hall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam
